base_description: This electrical network is composed of 5 nodes with 7 branches. The passive components include 5 resistive element(s). Energy is supplied through 2 voltage source(s). There are no controlled sources in this circuit. Measurement setup includes 2 voltage measurement(s), 1 current measurement(s). In total, this circuit comprises 7 circuit elements.

edits.instruction: Adjust the resistor 2 parameter from 91mΩ to 910kΩ.
Update resistance 4: change its value from 26Ω to 1Ω.
